content: k2tog/p2tog- knit/purl 2 stitches together medium k3 pm to indicate start of instep ssk- slip 1 stitch as if to knit slip another stitch k33 pm to indicate end of instep k7 k2tog send in the clowns copyright 2011 adrienne fong all rights reserved for personal non-commercial use only http //bellybuttonknits blogspot com k15 ssk k7 33 instep sts/31 heel sts gusset decreases large k1 pm to indicate start of instep k37 round 1 decrease round knit to last 3 pm to indicate end of instep k35 37 instep stitches before first instep marker k2tog k1 sts/35 heel sts slip marker work 29 33 37 sts in chart b as established slip marker k1 ssk knit to end of round heel will be worked over 29 31 35 sts round 2 knit around as established pattern place remaining 29 33 37 sts on a holder for stitches on instep and stockinette on sole instep heel flap is worked back and forth repeat these two rounds until 56 64 72 eye of partridge heel with garter stitch border stitches remain 29 33 37 instep sts/27 31 row 1 wrong side slip 1 k1 p across to last 35 sole sts 2 sts ending with k1 p1 turn row 2 slip 1 k1 *k1 slip1 repeat from * to foot continue working as established until last 3 sts ending with k3 turn foot measures approximately 1 1/2 1 3/4 2 row 3 slip 1 k1 p across to last 2 sts inches less than desired foot length ending on ending with k1 p1 turn row 9 or 19 of chart b row 4 slip 1 k2 *k1 slip1 repeat from * to last 4 sts ending with k4 turn set-up for toe knit first instep marker slip repeat row 1-4 until heel flap measures 2 1/4 marker k6 8 10 k2tog k13 ssk k6 8 to 2 1/2 inches or desired length ending on 10 pm to indicate new beginning of round row 2 or 4 27 31 35 instep sts/27 31 35 sole sts turn heel knit even until foot measures approximately 1 row 1 ws slip 1 p17 17 19 p2tog p1 1/4 1 1/2 1 3/4 inches less than desired foot turn length work toe row 2 slip 1 k8 6 6 ssk k1 turn row 3 slip 1 p9 7 7 p2tog p1 turn row 4 slip 1 k10 8 8 ssk k1 turn toe decrease round k1 ssk knit to last 3 continue working one more stitch until all the stitches before first instep marker k2tog k1 stitches have been worked you should end on slip marker k1 ssk knit across in pattern as a knit row with 19 19 21 sts remaining do established to last 3 stitches before second not turn work begin gusset instep marker k2tog k1 gusset pick up and knit one stitch in each work decrease round once knit 3 rounds work decrease round once knit 2 rounds slipped stitch along side
